entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is the caretaker who comes into the room wheezing and disheveled, indicating he has run here. He is described as having purple patches on his cheeks, aquiver jowls, and thin gray hair.

entities.name: mrs norris
entities.description: Mrs. Norris is the cat who comes trotting at Filch's heels, gazing up at the owls overhead and mewing hungrily.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the person being addressed by Filch, who accuses him of intending to place a massive order for Dungbombs.

entities.name: cho
entities.description: Cho is the person looking from Harry to Filch, also frowning. She has a barn owl on her arm.

entities.name: barn owl
entities.description: The barn owl is perched on Cho's arm, giving an admonitory hoot when it gets tired of standing on one leg.

relationships.description: Filch accuses Harry of intending to place a massive order for Dungbombs, as stated in the sentence 'Aha! said Filch, taking a fl at-footed step toward Harry, his pouchy cheeks trembling with anger. “I’ve had a tip-off that you are intending to place a massive order for Dungbombs!”'
Cho is looking from Harry to Filch, also frowning, indicating she is concerned about the situation.
